title: bitmap versal esszet?
content:
Hello everyone,  
I have finally figured out a way to create my own bitmap console font for linux, and I am working on making a versal esszet. However, my design skills are very lacking, and I was hoping you could give me some pointers to my first try. What I've got so far is:

.........  
.........  
.........  
.000000..  
00...00..  
00..00...  
00.00....  
00.00....  
00..00...  
00...00..  
00...00..  
00...00..  
00.000...  
.........  
.........  
.........

I'm not quite sure how to get a good image of it in use. I have the .psf.gz files if anybody wants to take a look.  
Thanks!  
Glen W.
author: Glen
